The world of Pokémon comes to life! The first-ever live-action Pokémon adventure, “POKÉMON Detective Pikachu” stars Ryan Reynoldsas Pikachu, the iconic face of the global Pokémon phenomenon—one of the world’s most popular, multi-generation entertainment…

title: LOS CRÍTICOS ESTÁN AMANDO DETECTIVE PIKACHU #CorporativoArcanos #Masukomi #SutaArcanos #Noticias #LiveAction #Cine #DETECTIVEPIKACHU
body:
En poco más de dos semanas estará llegando a cines la película de Detective Pikachu, la primera cinta live-action basada en la popular franquicia de Nintendo. Si bien los tráilers de ésta nos han permitido ver cómo lucirá o hasta el tono que tendrá, muchos siguen preocupados por el resultado final del film. Sin embargo, podemos sentirnos tranquilos ya que las primeras reacciones que han salido de…

summary: The official Pokemon Center Cafe will feature and exclusive Detective Pikachu menu from April 27 - June 30! The menu will...
caption:
The official Pokemon Center Cafe will feature and exclusive Detective Pikachu menu from April 27 - June 30! The menu will include:

Detective Pikachu Macaroni & cheese - 1,706 yen
Detective Pikachu & Psyduck Combo - 2,570 yen
Pokemon lattes - 756 yen each
Electric shock Detective Pikachu float drink - 1,274

summary:
News: A full hd poster of Detective Pikachu has been revealed! All of the Pokemon in the film are in the poster!
Me:...
body:
News: A full hd poster of Detective Pikachu has been revealed! All of the Pokemon in the film are in the poster!

Me: *laughs*

Me: You fool. You’ve awakened my instinct of wanting to pet every single one.

summary: Exhaustive. It’s hard to describe a series with twenty one movie adaptations (arguably more if you count TV specials and other...
caption:
Exhaustive. It’s hard to describe a series with twenty one movie adaptations (arguably more if you count TV specials and other lesser-known releases), in any other way. 

Now, Pokémon is set to release its twenty second, and first live-action film in theatres this May. Change is here. For one thing, every movie came with a promotional card or set of cards, but as the years went by, these exhausted themselves along with the movies. It may be cool to own an Ancient Mew card from the first movie, but nobody’s really talking about the promotional Keldeo card from Kyurem vs. the Sword of Justice. In fact, with some promotional cards like the above-named Keldeo card, not only are they not talked about, but they’re not really worth anything, are basically useless in competitive play, and are not valued among collectors. It’s a harsh reality. But, Detective Pikachu has promised us something different, and delivered. This new Detective Pikachu TCG expansion is fresh, exciting and even a little risky. But, is it worth the hype?  Read full article at Pokemon Dungeon :)

In fact, with some promotional cards like the above-named Keldeo card, not only are they not talked about, but they’re not really worth anything, are basically useless in competitive play, and are not valued among collectors.
